column4: or is anyone familiar with the whole Comcast/bittorrent deal, and the "possible fix" of dropping RST packets?
i am on comcast and yes it sucks, but there is no fix yet
just have to tough it out, and hopefully there will be fixes in the next version of torrent clients
technically it works, but it also sends the RST packets to your partner, so they'd need to know to drop them too
